attributes.action: confirm that the elected Prime Minister sitting in the Parliament of Westminster holds an English constituency seat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that there are separate parliament/assemblies for both Scotland and Wales who have elected members from constituencies within those principalities, it is only fair and just that the Prime Minister elected to serve in the parliament at Westminster can only do so if he has been elected to serve a constituency within the boundaries of England and not from either Scotland and Wales to ensure that the views of English voters are upheld.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
